column1: [[Image:Good and Evil in The Lord of the Rings.jpg|thumb]]

'''Good and Evil in''' '''''The Lord of the Rings''''' is an article by [[W.H. Auden]] discussing the theme of Good and Evil in [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''. It was published in ''Critical Quarterly''

column3: the article was published online by Blackwell Publishing Ltd.

column1: *[http://www3.interscience.wiley.com/journal/119911652/abstract Article on Wiley InterScience] (purchase only access)
